resources.string: Clean eating will help you to get better sleep and more focus
Take two hard boiled eggs, two tomatoes, chop and mix, add tablespoon of balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper to taste. Enjoy!
Thank you for getting this app! We hope you will enjoy the content and find something good.
Get yourself 300ml of water, banana, 100g kale, 1kg watermelon, 1 scotch bonnet and pinch of turmeric. Blend until smooth.
Yoga will help you to stretch your body and even become taller!
Stand up. Keep your feet at shoulder width. Exhale and fold over your legs.\nBend your knees if you need to. Stay in this position for a few seconds.\nInhale and get back to initial position.
Meditation will help you to find inner peace and find answers to questions
Find a comfortable place. Relax your muscles.\nTake a deep breath and hold it for 7 seconds. Breathe out. Repeat until timer ends.
